description: Assistance on e-Accounting Programme in the Former Yugoslav Republic of Macedonia

subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description: Output of this Programme includes design and introduction of a new information system for the Public Revenue Office that will support the implementation of the country’s new revenue regulations on income and property taxes.
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: eAccounting Capacity building

subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description: The project aims to design and introduce new n-tier IT software solution as a first step towards the full implementation of the new information system of the Public Revenue Office.
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: eAccounting Piloting

title: Assessment Study and Information System Migration Plan
